title: Sell Limit & Stop Loss
body:
## Step 2: Describe your environment
MAC OS Catalina 10.15.4
python 3.7.7 with conda 
branch -> dev 

 
## Step 3: Describe the problem:
I have a problem or I dont understand, but  I have simulated a bear market but I see the next : 

sell order to 6800 
stop loss to 6500  stop loss < sell order ???   may be take-profit, and dont see a stop_loss . I put on stop_loss in the Daily trade mode.

![Screen Shot 2020-04-11 at 18 30 27](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6999173/79055320-93e1c300-7c22-11ea-815b-9fe2b278ae54.png)

the logs:
 2020-04-11 18:25:53,738 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider XRP/BTC ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.VERY_SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:54,119 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider XRP/USDT ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:54,505 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider ETH/BTC ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:54,892 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider ADX/BTC ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:55,279 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider ADA/USDT ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:55,660 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider ETH/USDT ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:56,042 INFO     DailyTradingModeDecider BTC/USDT ** NEW FINAL STATE ** : EvaluatorStates.SHORT
 2020-04-11 18:25:56,751 INFO     TraderSimulator[binance] Order creation : BTC/USDT | SELL_LIMIT | Price : 6836.78 | Quantity : 0.042754 | Status : OPEN 
 2020-04-11 18:25:56,751 DEBUG    OrdersManagerSimulator[binance] Order added to open orders (total: 1 open order)
 2020-04-11 18:25:56,751 INFO     TraderSimulator[binance] Order creation : BTC/USDT | STOP_LOSS | Price : 6502.46 | Quantity : 0.042754 | Status : OPEN
